title: Shut Up, You Fake Fan! - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Average-looking Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Celebrities   Character Growth   College/University   Complex Family Relationships   Misunderstandings   Older Love Interests   Orphans   Quirky Characters   Showbiz
author: Yourwei   Your唯
description:
Ye Jiuyue, an extremely ordinary first year university student. 

Shen Weixing, an A-list celebrity. 

After a baffling, incidental one night stand, their relation progressed into a long-term “collaboration”, and everyday they testingly tip-toe on the line to angering the other to death. 

Shen Weixing: Me, I’m Shen Weixing, let’s get a hotel room.
Ye Jiuyue: I don’t believe you.

Shen Weixing: I’ll show you my face.
Ye Jiuyue: You could have gotten plastic surgery, though. 

Shen Weixing: I’ll show you my Weibo account.
Ye Jiuyue: You could have hacked the account, though. 

Shen Weixing: I’ll show you my personal id. 
Ye Jiuyue: You could have forged some fake id, though. 

Shen Weixing: I could also strangle you to death. 

Shen Weixing: Very good, you’ve successfully piqued my interest, I’ll give you the chance to slowly reveal your inner, manipulative side.
Ye Jiuyue: OMG, I dunno how it happened, but I’ve slept with my idol, can you believe it?

A Gong and Shou who both have very strange thought processes.>
